# delegate

**Instance Property**

The custom object from your app that provides the items to share.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use your delegate object to provide the set of items you want to share from your window. If this property is `nil`, AppKit disables the toolbar item.

## Getting the Toolbar Items

- **NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate**: An interface that provides the content to share from the macOS share sheet.
- **activityItemsConfiguration**: The custom object from an app built with Mac Catalyst that provides the items to share.
